did.abstract: Civil War letters from Camp John Sherman, Washington, D. C., and a camp near Clarksville, Tennessee. Subjects include hardships on long marches, picket duty on the Cumberland River where goods were being smuggled to the Confederacy, and African American reactions to Union troops.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Civil War letters from Camp John Sherman, Washington, D. C., and a camp near Clarksville, Tennessee. Subjects include hardships on long marches, picket duty on the Cumberland River where goods were being smuggled to the Confederacy, and African American reactions to Union troops.
